sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form class="add-subtask" @submit.prevent="$emit('submit', newSubtaskText)">
    <input
        type="text"
        v-model="newSubtaskText"
        placeholder="Add a new subtask"
        @keyup.enter="$emit('submit', newSubtaskText)"
    >
    <button type="submit">+</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newSubtaskText: ''
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.add-subtask {
  background-color: #FFECD7;
  padding: 11px 20px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 23px;
}
.add-subtask input {
  background: transparent;
  width: 100%;
}
</style>
